createUser: create table usertable (ID INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT '主键', USERNAME VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '账号', PSW VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '密码', SEX VARCHAR(1) COMMENT '性别', EMAIL VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '邮箱', NICKNAME VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '昵称', NAME VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '姓名', PHONENUM VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '手机')
createBookShelf: create table bookshelf (USERID VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '用户名', BOOKNAME VARCHAR(60) COMMENT '书名', AUTHOR VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '作者', IMGPATH VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '封面', PATH VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '阅读路径')
insertUser: insert into usertable (USERNAME, PSW, SEX, EMAIL, NICKNAME) values
insertBook: insert into bookshelf (USERID, BOOKNAME, AUTHOR, IMGPATH, PATH) values
